website_summaries.verdict: Quality baby plates with a fun design that is more cute than functional.
cons: Design makes it easy for food to get stuck in corners
Suction doesn't work 100% of the time

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but...
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups don't work well on my wood table. I've even tried to put some water underneath the cups but still doesn't work. The ears are a very small portion and regular sized flatwear don't get the food out well. Cleans very nicely in the dishwasher. My baby has figured out how to grab things and throw, so this plate is on the floor often. It's fine, but if the suction was better and ear portions slightly bigger, I'd be more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller than I thought but I didn't take the time.to look at.measurements so that's my fault. Otherwise it's so cute and my daughter thought it was so fun! Will be good for going to restaurants or other people's houses!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected it to be. I was hoping to get larger portion sizes in there but it's very small. It suctions well.
customer_reviews.author: LauraAduddell

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler plate I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: Finally a mat that my kid can’t just pick up and chuck. It actually sticks. Only downside is that it takes a few seconds to remove it from the high chair tray when the boy starts to throw his food. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bay

customer_reviews.title: Thus thing really sucks...to the table
customer_reviews.text: My son can’t entirely rip this off the table. The ears. Ale for good dipping areas. When he wants to sit in his high chair and eat it’s a great placemat. Does stain with tomato based sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Super Tiny!!
customer_reviews.text: Wayyy too small for a toddler! And beware ordering “red” it came as pink so I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: JessNYC

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too small
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this product but the food area is too small. It is super cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Qshare Counterfeits?
customer_reviews.text: The authentic Qshare plate has its brand name and logos such as dishwasher safe, BPA free logos on the back of the plate. However, the puppy plate I purchased, did not have any of these on the back of the plate. The packaging is also different as the counterfeit one came with a plastic packaging before they put in a Qshare zipbag . BE AWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Suction varies by surface
customer_reviews.text: Suction doesn’t work on our wooden table, but does on the granite countertop. Plate is definitely smaller than expected, but overall the right size for 18 month old meals. Wouldn’t purchase again, but still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea of these little plates and the suction cups to hold it in place
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Can’t wait to give it to my grandson! I know he will love it! Was a little disappointed though because I thought I was getting 3 plates for that price but I do love the plate
customer_reviews.author: Penny Figueiredo

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Their beautiful and sturdy plates are definitely worth the money. Each plate is very convenient for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: cute enough
customer_reviews.text: I want a plate that will not be thrown away or slip off a table or high chair easily. These are well made, cheap and cute, enough to make me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Seefeldt

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Good plates for toddlers. My daughter likes to sort food into different compartments. The plate sucks very well, don’t worry about being knocked over by her, I like it
customer_reviews.author: Next Level Mobile Detailing

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but colors are correct.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but I ordered the red one and it was actually pink.
customer_reviews.author: C. Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Pink, not red...?
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered this for a girl! Its bright pink instead of red! I had hoped for red so it could be passed down to either a boy or girl but oh well. It is a small plate but its good for a baby who's learning to eat. Kids who eat more than this holds should not be throwing their plates around enough to need it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaSews

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute! Suction is great, especially with my crazy toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

product_meta.title: Qshare Toddler Plate, Portable Baby Plates for Toddlers and Kids, BPA-Free Strong Suction Plates for Toddlers, Dishwasher & Microwave Safe Silicone Placemat 11x8x1 inch (3Puppy-Turq)
feature_bullets: UNIQUE DESIGN - The Unique Pleasing Design Silicone Placemat with Bright Color Makes Meal Times More Fun for Kids. The Mini Size 11x8x1 Inch can Fits Most Highchair Trays
QUALITY AND SAFETY MATERIALS - 100% Food Grade Silicone. BPA, PVC, BPS and Phthalate Free for Better Food Safety
STABLE DESIGN - Completely Stain Resistant, Our Toddler Plate Feature Raised Bowl Edges, Proper Portion Sizes and Strong Suction to Reduce Spills and Messes
STRONG SUCTION - Suctions Securely to Any Hard, Flat Surface. Makes Your Meal Time with Your Little Ones More Enjoyable

DISHWASHER SAFE, MICROWAVE SAFE AND FREEZER SAFE - The Placemats for Kids Can be Put into Freezer, Microwave and Dishwasher without Any Worries. Our Silicone Placemat are Highly Durable and They are Rated to Withstand Direct Contacts with Temperatures in Excess of +450 and -40 Degrees Fahrenheit
